text:
The mod_auth_ldap documentation says nothing about where to get the
mod_auth_ldap module for Apache 2 on Windows 2000.

Either the download information is missing in the documentation - or the module
is missing in the binary distribution.

I tried to find the module but there seem to be more than one:
- mod_auth_ldap by M.Muquit which is available for Apache2 but has another
config file syntax
(http://www.muquit.com/muquit/software/mod_auth_ldap/mod_auth_ldap_apache2.html)
- auth_ldap by D.Carrigan which has the same syntax as in the apache docs but
isn't available for Apache2 (http://www.rudedog.org/auth_ldap/)

Best regards
  gus
creator: gusweb@gmx.net
psychosos@gmx.at
text: Seems so, yes. At least there is a modules/mod_auth_ldap.so in the windows binary installation.
Seems to be fixed, according to comment #3.
creator: minfrin@sharp.fm
